description: Maximum Hanger/Support Spacing for Galvanized Steel Round Ducts by Diameter and Gauge, per SMACNA 4th Edition
notes: Spacing is the maximum allowed between hangers/supports for horizontal runs of round ducts.
Heavier duct gauges or shorter spans may allow for increased loads per SMACNA.
Always support at each joint and close to any connections, branches, or changes in direction.
Check SMACNA and local code for exceptions and updates.
